t: Social Distortion - Greatest Hits[LP] - Amazon.com Music
s: A must for any fan of vinyl. ... I've been getting most of my SD from the Live at the Roxy album. This is a good album for a few more songs and a studio production of the live songs. ... This is one of the most solid punk/rock album out there. Fast paced but not too heavy, a lot of energy. Like a double shot of espresso in the morning. ... i'm not the biggest fan of Social Distortion...

t: Amazon.com: Mommy's Little Monster[LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Over the past four decades, Social Distortion?have all but trademarked their sound, a brand of hard rockabilly/punk that's cut with the melodic, road-tested lyrics of frontman Mike Ness. Their searing guitars and a locomotive rhythm section sound?as alive today as they did in the beginning.

My favorite Social Distortion album, I highly recommend for anyone, as far as I'm concerned the band hit this one outta the park, just flawless, every song on this album is solid from front to back. Vinyl pressing is good.
